p: Our 3% to 10.8% albedo increase was larger than the 4.1% recorded for some experiments [ 12] while our average albedo increase of 0.01 to 0.02 was smaller than the increase of 0.04 seen in other simulations [ 24]. The local cooling observed in our study is seen, although not to the same extent, in some [ 12, 22] but not all [ 24] comparable experiments.
